ose the Morphic Panel
You can reopen it using the Morphic Icon
gpii_app_qss_settings_close.title: Затвори

gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.tooltip: o the last change you made in the Morphic Bar.
gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.title: do

gpii_app_qss_settings_save.tooltip: Save your preferences so you can access them from other Morphic-enabled computers.
gpii_app_qss_settings_save.title: Запиши

tooltip.keyedIn:
Open the Morphic Panel
Where you can quickly adjust often-changed settings of yours.
tooltip.keyedOut:
Open the Morphic Panel
Where you can sign in to apply your saved personal settings.

gpii_app_qss_settings_more.tooltip: More options for changing the settings on this computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_more.title:
ORE...

(& HELP)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tooltip:
Turn Chrome’s ability to read text on/off.
Works in Chrome only.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: ead Aloud

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.
Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: igh / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors
Works in Chrome, Windows and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some programs)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change the screen size to make everything larger/smaller.
Works everywhere.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: creen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Приближава всичко на екрана
Стойността на приближаване варира между машините.

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Change text size.
Works in Windows, Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and many other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Приближи Приложение / Текст
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zooms one application.
Works in many applications -- for the window on top.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: Също можете да използвате CTRL със Scroll по всяко време.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change language.
Works in Windows, Edge, and many other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: anguage
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Changes language.
Works in Windows and programs that support Windows language settings.
  • Does not change the language in documents or files.
  • May need to restart some programs.
